verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> the assembly <S%G1577><s%> that was <S%G5607><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> teachers: <S%G1320><s%> <S%G5037><s%> Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Simeon <S%G4826><s%> who was called <S%G2564><s%> Niger, <S%G3526><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Lucius <S%G3066><s%> of Cyrene, <S%G2956><s%> <S%G5037><s%> Manaen <S%G3127><s%> the foster brother of <S%G4939><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch, <S%G5076><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> Saul. <S%G4569><s%>

As <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> served <S%G3008><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fasted, <S%G3522><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Separate <S%G873><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> to which I have called <S%G4341><s%> them. <S%G5037><s%>"

Then, <S%G5119><s%> when they had fasted <S%G3522><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayed <S%G4336><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> laid <S%G2007><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> on them, <S%G846><s%> they sent <S%G630><s%> them away. <S%G630><s%>

So, <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3778><s%> being sent out <S%G1599><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> they <S%G3778><s%> went down <S%G2718><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Seleucia. <S%G4581><s%> From there <S%G1564><s%> they sailed <S%G636><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Cyprus. <S%G2954><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G1096><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Salamis, <S%G4529><s%> they proclaimed <S%G2605><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Jewish <S%G2453><s%> synagogues. <S%G4864><s%> They <S%G1161><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> as their attendant. <S%G5257><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> they had gone through <S%G1330><s%> the island <S%G3520><s%> to <S%G891><s%> Paphos, <S%G3974><s%> they found <S%G2147><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> sorcerer, <S%G3097><s%> a false prophet, <S%G5578><s%> a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was Bar Jesus, <S%G919><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the proconsul, <S%G446><s%> Sergius <S%G4588><s%> Paulus, <S%G3972><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> of understanding. <S%G4908><s%> This man <S%G3778><s%> summoned <S%G4341><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Saul, <S%G4569><s%> and sought <S%G1934><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Elymas <S%G1681><s%> the sorcerer <S%G3097><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G3177><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> by interpretation <S%G3177><s%>) withstood <S%G436><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> to turn aside <S%G1294><s%> the proconsul <S%G446><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the faith. <S%G4102><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Saul, <S%G4569><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is also <S%G2532><s%> called Paul, <S%G3972><s%> filled with <S%G4130><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> fastened his eyes <S%G816><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him, <S%G2532><s%>

and said, <S%G2036><s%> "Full <S%G4134><s%> of <S%G5599><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> deceit <S%G1388><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> cunning, <S%G4468><s%> you son <S%G5207><s%> of the devil, <S%G1228><s%> you enemy <S%G2190><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> will you <S%G3973><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> cease <S%G3973><s%> to pervert <S%G1294><s%> the right <S%G2117><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord? <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is on <S%G1909><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you will be <S%G2071><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> seeing <S%G991><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> for <S%G891><s%> a season! <S%G2540><s%>" <S%G1161><s%> Immediately <S%G3916><s%> a mist <S%G887><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> went around <S%G4013><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> someone to lead him by the hand. <S%G5497><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> the proconsul, <S%G446><s%> when he saw <S%G1492><s%> what was done, <S%G1096><s%> believed, <S%G4100><s%> being astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and his company <S%G4012><s%> set sail <S%G321><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Paphos, <S%G3974><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Perga <S%G4011><s%> in Pamphylia. <S%G3828><s%> <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> departed <S%G672><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> and returned <S%G5290><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> they, <S%G846><s%> passing on <S%G1330><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Perga, <S%G4011><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> of Pisidia. <S%G4099><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and sat down. <S%G2523><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> the reading <S%G320><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> the rulers of the synagogue <S%G752><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G435><s%> "Brothers, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you have <S%G2076><s%> any word <S%G3056><s%> of exhortation <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5213><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> speak. <S%G3004><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> stood up, <S%G450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beckoning with <S%G2678><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Men <S%G435><s%> of Israel, <S%G2475><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you who fear <S%G5399><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> listen. <S%G191><s%>

The God <S%G2316><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> <S%G2474><s%> chose <S%G1586><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> exalted <S%G5312><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> they stayed as aliens <S%G3940><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt, <S%G125><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an uplifted <S%G5308><s%> arm, <S%G1023><s%> he <S%G1806><s%> led them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of it. <S%G846><s%>
For <S%G2532><s%> a period <S%G5550><s%> of about <S%G5613><s%> forty years <S%G5063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> put up with <S%G5159><s%> them in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> he had destroyed <S%G2507><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Canaan, <S%G5477><s%> he gave <S%G2624><s%> them <S%G846><s%> their <S%G846><s%> land <S%G1093><s%> for an inheritance, <S%G2624><s%> for about four hundred <S%G5071><s%> fifty <S%G4004><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>
After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> them judges <S%G2923><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> Samuel <S%G4545><s%> the prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

Afterward <S%G2547><s%> they asked <S%G154><s%> for a king, <S%G935><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> Saul <S%G4549><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Kish, <S%G2797><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Benjamin, <S%G958><s%> for forty <S%G5062><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> he had removed <S%G3179><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he raised up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G846><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> to be <S%G1519><s%> their king, <S%G935><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> testified, <S%G3140><s%> <S%G2036><s%> <S%G2147><s%> 'I have found David <S%G1138><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son of Jesse, <S%G2421><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> will. <S%G2307><s%>'

From <S%G575><s%> this man <S%G5127><s%>'s seed, <S%G4690><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G1453><s%> brought <S%G1453><s%> salvation <S%G4990><s%> <S%G4990><s%> to Israel <S%G2474><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his promise, <S%G1860><s%>

before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G4383><s%> his <S%G846><s%> coming, <S%G1529><s%> when <S%G4296><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> had first preached <S%G4296><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> to <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2992><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was fulfilling <S%G4137><s%> his course, <S%G1408><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'What do you suppose that <S%G5282><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> am? <S%G1511><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> he. <S%G235><s%> But behold, <S%G2400><s%> one <S%G2064><s%> comes after <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> the sandals <S%G5266><s%> of <S%G4228><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to untie. <S%G3089><s%>'

<S%G435><s%> Brothers, <S%G80><s%> children <S%G435><s%> of the stock <S%G1085><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> who fear <S%G5399><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> is <S%G649><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> out to you. <S%G5213><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> those who dwell <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> rulers, <S%G758><s%> because they didn't <S%G50><s%> know <S%G50><s%> him, <S%G5126><s%> nor the <S%G2532><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are read <S%G314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2596><s%> Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> them by condemning him. <S%G2919><s%>

Though <S%G2532><s%> they found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> for death, <S%G2288><s%> they <S%G154><s%> still asked Pilate <S%G4091><s%> to have him <S%G846><s%> killed. <S%G337><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> they had fulfilled <S%G5055><s%> all <S%G537><s%> things that were written <S%G1125><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they took <S%G2507><s%> him down <S%G2507><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the tree, <S%G3586><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> him in <S%G1519><s%> a tomb. <S%G3419><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%>

and <S%G3739><s%> he was seen <S%G3700><s%> for many <S%G4119><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> by those who came up with <S%G4872><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> his <S%G846><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the people. <S%G1909><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> bring <S%G2097><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> good news <S%G2097><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the fathers, <S%G3962><s%>

that God <S%G2316><s%> has fulfilled <S%G1603><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> to us, <S%G2254><s%> their <S%G846><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> in that he raised up <S%G450><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> <S%G450><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> it is <S%G1125><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> psalm, <S%G5568><s%> <S%G4771><s%> 'You are <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have <S%G1080><s%> become <S%G1080><s%> your father. <S%G1080><s%>'

<S%G1161><s%> "Concerning that <S%G3754><s%> he raised <S%G450><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> now no more <S%G3371><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> return <S%G5290><s%> to <S%G3195><s%> corruption, <S%G1312><s%> he has spoken <S%G2046><s%> thus: <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1325><s%> 'I will give you <S%G5213><s%> the holy and sure <S%G4103><s%> blessings <S%G3741><s%> of David. <S%G1138><s%>'

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> he says <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> psalm, <S%G1325><s%> 'You will not <S%G3756><s%> allow <S%G1325><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> Holy One <S%G3741><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> decay. <S%G1312><s%>'

For <S%G1063><s%> David, <S%G1138><s%> after he had in his own <S%G2398><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> served <S%G5256><s%> the counsel <S%G1012><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> fell asleep, <S%G2837><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was laid <S%G4369><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fathers, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> decay. <S%G3303><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> he whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raised up <S%G1453><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> decay. <S%G1312><s%>

Be it <S%G2077><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> <S%G435><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> this man <S%G435><s%> is proclaimed <S%G2605><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> remission <S%G859><s%> of sins, <S%G266><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G5129><s%> everyone who believes <S%G4100><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> from which <S%G3739><s%> you could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses. <S%G3475><s%>
Beware <S%G991><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> that come <S%G1904><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> which is spoken <S%G2046><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the prophets: <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> 'Behold, you scoffers, <S%G2707><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonder, <S%G2296><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> perish; <S%G853><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> a work <S%G2041><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> a work <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you will <S%G4100><s%> in no <S%G3756><s%> way <S%G3361><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> declares it <S%G1555><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>'"

So <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1826><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> went out <S%G1826><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> begged <S%G3870><s%> that these <S%G5023><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> might be preached <S%G2980><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519><s%> the next <S%G3342><s%> Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>
